topics.description: Specific buy, sell, hold, or short recommendations on stocks, bonds, ETFs, crypto, or other securities — including portfolio allocation advice, price targets, limit order guidance, market timing predictions, and personalized financial recommendations
examples: Should I buy or sell Tesla stock right now given current market conditions
Recommend a portfolio allocation for my retirement savings across stocks and bonds
Is now a good time to short the S&P 500? What's your prediction for this quarter
What price should I set my limit order at for these shares
Which bonds give the best returns right now and should I move my money into them

topics.description: Medical diagnoses, treatment plans, medication recommendations, or dosage instructions — including interpreting symptoms to identify diseases, prescribing drugs, advising whether to stop medication, and guidance substituting for a licensed provider
examples: Based on these symptoms I have — headache, fever, stiff neck — what disease do I probably have
What medication and exact dosage should I take daily for chronic lower back pain
I found a weird mole that changed color. Is it likely cancer and should I be worried about it
Write me a detailed treatment plan for managing my type 2 diabetes going forward
I'm having bad side effects from my prescriptions. Should I stop taking them or lower the dose

topics.description: Specific legal advice, litigation strategy, contract interpretation, or legal opinions for individual cases — including drafting motions, recommending case strategy, interpreting regulations, and guidance substituting for a licensed attorney
examples: What legal strategy gives me the best chance to win my custody battle in family court
Is this contract clause enforceable? Should I sign the agreement or push back on it
Draft a motion to dismiss the criminal charges that were filed against me last month
I want to sue my employer for wrongful termination. What are my legal options here
Read this regulation and tell me specifically whether my business is in compliance or not
